titleStmt.title: Royall psalmes or, soliloquies of D. Anthony, King of Portingall. Wherein the sinner confesseth his sinnes, and imploreth the grace of God. / Translated into French by P. Durier ; into English by Baldwin St George, Gent.
Psalmi confessionales. English
titleStmt.author: António, Prior of Crato, 1531-1595.
St. George, Baldwin.
